props.name: description
props.example: Our advanced spyware detection engine can identify if a device contains spyware or bugging software.

state.title: Spyware detection
state.description: Our advanced spyware detection engine can identify if a device contains spyware or bugging software.

state.title: Keylogger detection
state.description: Find malicious keyboards installed on your device that could allow someone to record things you type (e.g. passwords).

state.title: Find tracking apps
state.description: Check which apps have access to your location, microphone or camera. Get alerted if a known tracking app is installed.

state.title: OS integrity check
state.description: Analyze your operating system for signs of tampering that could compromise security, such as Jailbreaking.

state.title: Threat removal
state.description: Our intelligent scan will either safely remove threats for you or provide easy-to-follow instructions.

state.title: Easy to use
state.description: We create easy to use apps that can check your device for vulnerabilities in a matter of minutes.
